section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
FEDIL Founded in 1918, FEDIL is a multisectoral business federation giving a voice to industrials and entrepreneurs, fostering Luxembourg’s economy. 
 https://www.fedil.lu/
goals__remit: The goal of ispace is to support the development of lunar exploration and commercialization.
relevant_communication: We are active at a number of space conferences, including most recently isef-2 which took place in Tokyo. We regularly communicate with international media about our lunar exploration plans.
